resources.string: \nLearn to wrap your hands to protect them while you practice Muay Thai or Boxing:
\n\nCatch your opponent off guard with a Low Kick:
\n\nOne good knee can end a fight, make them count:
\n\nWhen your opponent enters Clinch range, make them regret it:
\n\nIf your opponent is rushing, Teep (Push Kick) them back:
